title: Smaato Adapter Params
description: A schema which validates params accepted by the Smaato adapter

publisherId.description: A unique identifier for this impression within the context of the bid request

adSpaceId.description: Identifier for specific ad placement is SOMA `adSpaceId`

instl.description: A flag that shows if fullscreen ads is requested. 0 = not interstitial ad, 1 = the ad is interstitial or full screen.

secure.description: A flag that shows if the ads is secured. 0 = not secure uses http, 1 = the ad is secure uses https.
